content:
path /v3/bsc/block/current
operationid bscgetcurrentblock
summary get current block number
description 1 credit per api call
get bsc current block number this is the number of the latest block in the blockchain
responses
200
schema
type number
description current block number
description ok
tag_summary:
binance smart chain is an ethereum evm 100 compatible blockchain and is very good for decentralized application dapp development within many possible verticals including defi nft gaming and many others
tatum supports 2 chains
mainnet  a regular live chain
testnet  a chain used for testing purposes coins on the test chain have no value and can be obtained from
a faucet eg https//testnetbinanceorg/faucetsmart
title: 4_BNB Smart Chain_BscGetCurrentBlock_46.json
